item.title: Fear
item.description: Intro To me, fear of publicity correlates with my childhood environment. A small settlement Topar, 70km away from Karaganda, Kazakhstan. Talking or writing about your thoughts in public space is something that I skip subconsciously but I feel why. This is a situation where I have to show up my skills, achievements, my self â€” you better watch out boy because you don’t want troubles when the drunken father is watching.
